name: It's Just a Dream (Wilast)
description:
Short Story:

You are a night guard in a park for rest. A small group of people come to the park at night to set up camp for a holiday. But at night, an incident occurs. You hear strange noises and decide to check what happened.

Controls:

WASD - move

Mouse - look around

E - interact

Esc - return to the main menu (keep in mind that if you exit to the main menu, you will have to start the game again)

Estimated time to complete the game is 5-7 minutes.
